name: Bacon Mac and Cheese Bombs
author: Pam Cooking Spray
summary: Appetizer recipe with mac 'n' cheese and bacon stuffed inside pizza crust dough and served with ranch dressing.
ingredients: 1  serving PAM® Original No-Stick Cooking Spray
2 cups leftover Marie Callender's® Vermont White Cheddar Mac & Cheese
8 slices fully cooked bacon, heated, chopped
1 (13.8 ounce) package refrigerated pizza crust dough
directions: Spray 9-inch pie plate with cooking spray; set aside
Stir together mac and cheese and bacon in medium bowl; set aside
Unroll pizza dough; press into a 15x9 rectangle
Divide mac and cheese mixture evenly and place in the center of each piece
Pull edges of each piece of dough up and around mac and cheese mixture to enclose completely; pinching seams to seal
Place seam-side down in pie plate
Brush tops of dough with butter
Sprinkle evenly with parsley flakes and garlic powder
Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until top is golden brown
